solution_line_template: If each candle is {beeswax_per_candle} ounces of beeswax and {coconut_oil_per_candle} ounce of coconut oil, then each candle weighs {beeswax_per_candle}+{coconut_oil_per_candle}=<<{beeswax_per_candle}+{coconut_oil_per_candle}={weight_per_candle}>>{weight_per_candle} ounces.
Three less than {total_candles_base} candles is {total_candles_base}-{candles_less}=<<{total_candles_base}-{candles_less}={num_candles_made}>>{num_candles_made} candles.

Thus, {num_candles_made} candles, each weighing {weight_per_candle} ounces, will have a combined weight of {num_candles_made}*{weight_per_candle}=<<{num_candles_made}*{weight_per_candle}={combined_weight}>>{combined_weight} ounces.
